nodes.text: Star Wars Battlefront: Prima Official Game Guide

Star Wars Battlefront: Prima Official Game Guide was a strategy guide published by Prima Games for Star Wars: Battlefront. The game guide explains and describes the movement, the combat basics, the gameplay concepts, the various modes of the game, the units and classes, the weapons and equipment, vehicles and turrets, and all the battlefields and locations included in Star Wars: Battlefront.
Fight the classic Star Wars battles any way you want to.
Maps detailing command posts, vehicle spawn points, and defensive features.
